field.description: mTouch Quiz will automatically populate the fields below. Feel Free to add additional fields for the Quiz Taker to complete using the "Add Fields" options to the right.
field.label: mTouch Quiz Populated Fields

field.description: The number of correct answers. This has the same value as the %%SCORE%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Score

field.description: The total number of questions. This has the same value as the %%TOTAL%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Total Questions

field.description: Correct answer percentage. This has the same value as the %%PERCENTAGE%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Percentage

field.description: Number of wrong answers. This has the same value as the %%WRONG_ANSWERS%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Wrong Answers

field.description: Time allowed (Requires timer add on). This has the same value as the %%TIME_ALLOWED%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Time Allowed (Seconds)

field.description: Time used (Requires timer add on). This has the same value as the %%TIME_USED%% Variable on the Final Screen.
field.label: Time Used (Seconds)
